data.title: MI FU AND THE CLASSICAL TRADITION OF CHINESE CALLIGRAPHY
data.meta_description: Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1979. First Edition, First Printing. Quarto, 131 pages, 50 plates; VG/VG; spine black, with white lettering; dust jacket protected with a mylar covering; mild shelf wear and soiling; mild wear to crown and tail of jacket spine; contains black and white photographs; pages clean; shelved Case 11.
